Summary: Bright light wavering....larger and brighter than any of the stars.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Clearlake
There was one other sighting in Clearlake on or around September 24th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 10:00pm on September 24, 2007. I was out looking for my cat. I was admiring the stars when I noticed a bright light wavering. I thought it might be a plane, but it was silent and did not have any blinking lights. It stayed in sight about 10 minutes and moved very slowly right then left, up and down slightly. it was larger and brighter than any fo the stars it eventually disappeared behind some clouds. The same thing appeared about 2 weeks later-hubby witnessed. October 8, 2007.
